GSD.product_version: versions from v5.12 to before v6.1.7
GSD.description:
platform/surface: aggregator: Add missing call to ssam_request_sync_free()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.1.7 by commit 50b3cdf8239b11545f311c4f7b89e0092e4feedb, it was introduced in version v5.12 by commit c167b9c7e3d6131b4a4865c112a3dbc86d2e997d. For more details please see the references link.
